title: FT: PSA 3 Cobb bat off Sovereign
author: ajjohnsonsoxfan

posts.post_title: FT: PSA 3 Cobb bat off Sovereign
posts.post_content: I'm not a back collector so don't particular care about the Sovereign vs. the more common P&SC backs.  Looking for an as nice psa 4 or higher batt off in trade for someone who wants the Sovereign.
Thanks Tyler...can't figure out why it got the grade except for the soft upper left corner.  Otherwise it's pretty solid!
